This game is my favourite GoldSrc Half-Life game of all time.
I picked this game up when I was as young as 7 years old and wanted to play more half-life games.
i was taken aback because I was used to handling a crowbar and killing people with a glock but the game grew on me. 
The introduction of new weapons and new enemies was an eye-opener because it added so much more to the game, seeing Freeman jumping into Xen was one of my most treasured moments throughout the game.
Everything about this game is amazing, especially the introduction of Adrian Shephard (which in my opinion has the coolest playermodel and design out of all 3 Half-life protagonists).
It's a shame that these expansions to the half-life universe may or may not be canon and the fact that we might never see Shephard's story continue ever again. 
Regardless, I recommend this game to anyone looking to prolong their Half-Life experience and trying to make the most of it whilst staying in the original engine.
Thanks for reading this review

E' molto interessante giocare "Half life" dal punto di vista dei "nemici".
Stranamente l'ho trovato più difficile di half life dal punto di vista dei nemici, ovvero, gli alieni sono più complessi rispetto a quelli combattuti da Gordon Freeman in Half life, però non posso dire lo stesso nei riguardi del boss finale, piuttosto semplice direi, però, trattandosi di un capitolo "minore" la scelta di un boss finale non troppo difficile direi che è abbastanza sensata.
Il gioco è meno articolato di Half Life classico ma, come già detto precedentemente, ha senso trattandosi di un capitolo minore, però direi che è abbastanza bello, soprattutto per chi è curioso di sapere cosa si prova a stare "dall'altra parte" o "da un punto di vista diverso" durante l'incidente di Black Mesa.
Spero un giorno che la Valve si ricorderà del nostro amicone Adrian Shephard perchè vorrei rivederlo anche in altri capitoli (se ci saranno).

This is by far the best expansion for a video game ever made.  They could have taken the easy way out and create an experience that is pretty much a carbon copy of the vanilla Half Life campaign without adding any new content such as weapons,  enemies,  or story.  But they did not and they took the time to give us some awesome new weapons like the M249,  and the Spore Launcher.  Not to mention they gave us another awesome silent protagonist Adrian Shepard.  In my opinion next to Borderlands 2 and 3 this is Gearboxes best work.  If you have not already please stop whatever you are doing and pick this game up.  Trust me you will not want to miss out on the experience.

Первое легендарное дополнение для первой легендарной Half-Life, в котором предстоит увидеть и поучаствовать в событиях после «каскадного резонанса» в комплексе Black Mesa со стороны капрала Адриана Шепарда, солдата спецподразделения HECU. Предстоит посетить как новые так и хорошо знакомые по первой Half-Life локации, а также увидеть Гордона Фримена. В дополнении присутствуют много новых врагов, в том числе новые виды зомби. Арсенал также пополнили, особенно инопланетный (например, ручной барнакл, шоковый таракан и спорометатель). Вместо привычной монтировки теперь у главного героя будет трубный ключ, а также ручной телепорт, который позволит на усмотрение игрока перемещаться из комплекса и посетить некоторые локации Xen и вернуться обратно. Игра очень интересная, рекомендую.        НАЖМИТЕ НАГРАДИТЬ!!!

This is a very good game, but I get the feeling they tried too much to add new things to the game.
Mainly the barnacle as a weapon. The concept is very cool, using it to latch on to something and cross a gap, but the execution is buggy and frustrating.
And I didn't use all the weapons in the game (I barely used all in the original Half Life too, so maybe that's just me).
The new enemies are great, and those really added a lot to the game.
New game mechanics and same yet alternative play-style to the OG HL. Very yes.

Half Life Opposing force has the same principal as Half Life, yet it is somehow just more fun, the new and unique weaponry, the new enemies, the companions you can get to help you out, it's just great.

The community is pretty great in terms of artwork

There are a few bugs, but none game breaking.

The game runs fast and loads almost instantly.

Overall I recommend the game.

Really great expansion of the first game with new weapons and enemies as well as an interesting new perspective
While not as good as the main game like some people say i still think it's one of the best expansions i have ever played and well worth playing

Although it is better than Gearbox's other expansion, Blue Shift, Opposing Force still does not live up to the original Half Life. The level design is not as tight, the new enemies aren't as well-designed as the original aliens, and the boss fights near the end of the game are quite clunky.

Bonjour à tous, aujourd’hui on se retrouve pour la review de [u][b]Half-Life Opposing Force[/b][/u]

[h1]C’est quoi Half Life Opposing Force ?[/h1]
Half-Life Opposing Force est un jeu de type FPS science-fiction en solo sorti en 1999, développé par Gearbox et édité par Valve. Ce standalone de la série Half-Life va vous plonger une fois de plus dans le complex Black Mesa lors de l’attaque extraterrestre mais du point de vue du caporal Adrian Shephard.

[h1]Descriptif[/h1]
[list]
[*][b]Graphismes :[/b][i]Pour un jeu de la préhistoire c’est très beau[/i]
[*][b]Level design :[/b][i]Très beau, avec des univers différents et très détaillés[/i]
[*][b]Sound design :[/b][i]Un sound design de qualité, rien à redire[/i]
[*][b]Musiques :[/b][i]Peu de musiques ce qui est dommage[/i]
[*][b]Histoire :[/b][i]Ce nouveau point de vue donne à l’histoire une nouvelle touche de piment[/i]
[*][b]Durée de vie :[/b][i]Une moyenne de 4h ce qui est plutôt sympa pour un[/i]
[*][b]Optimisation/fluidité :[/b][i]Si vous ne parvenez pas à jouer au jeu en ultra à 100fps minimum, remettez vous en question[/i]
[*][b]Bugs :[/b][i]Parfois vous allez rester coincé dans les murs ou des rebords bizarres ce qui va vous forcer à relancer le jeu et repartir du dernier checkpoint[/i]
[*][b]Prix :[/b][i]Un prix à la limite du raisonnable sauf quand il est en promo[/i]
[/list]

[h1]Ma note finale[/h1]
[b]17/20[/b] Un excellent Half-Life comme d’habitude, malgré sa courte durée de vie, vous allez y passer un bon moment dessus.

Bref, c’était ma review sur Half-Life Opposing Force et on se donne rendez vous pour la review d’un autre jeu. BYE !!

Anyone who's played the original Half-Life should also consider playing this expansion.  The different perspective is not only cool from a story perspective (You play as one of the soldiers trying to kill Gordon Freeman from HL1), but from a gameplay perspective you also get more weapons such as sniper rifles, and night vision goggles to enhance the feeling of being a soldier in Black Mesa.  Multiplayer is also fun, with some servers still (relatively) active and you can get easy kills if you know the work-arounds of online.  Overall, 8.5/10

The best original Half-Life part in my opinion.
While Blue Shift has its moments Shepard actually has somewhat of an identity and compared to Half-Life is this in terms of riddles and puzzles more accessible.
Regarding difficulty, ammunition and health is almost always scarce and companions are for once useful. Further complicating the resources is the amount of weapons to chose from making orientation and overview very hard.

Es una muy buena expansión. Eres un militar que viene a silenciar a los sobrevivientes de la Cascada de resonancia y a matar a los aliens que salieron de Xen. 
Pero de repente una raza nueva, la Raza X. Viene a conquistar la tierra aprovechandose del suceso de Black Mesa.
Tiene nuevas mecanicas, nuevas armas, nuevas criaturas, nuevos puzzles y nuevas misiones desde un punto de vista totalmente distinto. Una historia muy buena y un protagonista entrañable. Totalmente recomendable.
Really expands upon Half-Life's story and characters, the story is told through the perspective of the enemy team

La expansion del Half Life Opposing Force trae cosas nuevas, como mecanicas, armas y enemigos
Profundizando en el tema tenemos las armas: ya no tendremos la barreta tendremos una llave inglesa y un cuchillo tambien trae armas de fuego como la michigun o el arma de portales (no la de portal) o la enredadera (estilo Spider-Man) Las demas dejare que las vean ustedes
Enemigos nuevos:esta expansion trae un nuevo jefe final, nuevos bichos raros que reemplazan a varios originales evitando que sea repetitiva la experiencia con los enemigos
en vez de una linterna trae unos lentes de vision nocturna
